subject: Parenting
title: Strict Parents Raise Better Kids
description: A quick win: understand Strict Parents Raise Better Kids.

hook.text: 'Spare the rod, spoil the child.' This proverb has been proven wrong by every major study.

buildup.text: Strictness is often conflated with structure. They are not the same thing.

discovery.text: Harsh strictness predicts worse outcomes: lower self-esteem, more aggression, poorer mental health.

climax.text: Physical punishment specifically increases aggression in children rather than reducing it.

punchline.text: Firm is effective. Harsh is destructive. Know the difference.
